attributes.action: Make people realise that there has always been Global Warming!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Global Warming has always been happening.
The Goverment are trying to make it look worse than it is to get more money out of us.
It's all a scam and must be stopped, so we can live our lives normally again instead of worrying about everything we do incase its adding to Global Warming!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
